Name: [Assist] Emergency Enhancement Device
Desc: Triggering Perfect Assist increases all squad members' CRIT DMG by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> for 10s.
Desc2: A micro enhancement device that works on the surface of the skin. While its effect is limited and temporary, it's incredibly convenient. All you need to do is attach it to your skin like a plaster, and you're good to go.
